unnormalised: Arrey yaar, getting 90% in ICSE is tough! My cousin studied day and night to get a decent score. I heard the CBSE exams are also quite challenging this year, especially maths and science. Good luck to all the students appearing for their Class 10 and 12 exams! Results usually come out around May 15th-June 10th, so keep an eye out. Don't stress too much though, marks aren't everything! Focus on learning and understanding concepts instead of rote learning.
normalised: Arrey yaar, getting ninety percent in I-C-S-E is tough! My cousin studied day and night to get a decent score. I heard the C-B-S-E exams are also quite challenging this year, especially maths and science. Good luck to all the students appearing for their Class ten and twelve exams! Results usually come out around May fifteenth to June tenth, so keep an eye out. Don't stress too much though, marks aren't everything! Focus on learning and understanding concepts instead of rote learning.
